title: Frameflow AI screenshot tool
descriptionHtml: Developed an automated screenshot maintenance tool using Cloudflare Workers AI, Browser Rendering, and Playwright. The tool identifies dashboard UI changes, captures updated screenshots and videos with an AI-driven detection model, and automatically submits GitHub pull requests to update documentation assets. This process drastically reduces manual content maintenance overhead.

title: Python résumé generator
descriptionHtml: Created a custom resume engine that treats career data as source code. Built a Python-based pipeline that parses YAML source files into HTML and PDF formats. This tool also uses a watcher script for real-time browser rendering.

title: Cloudflare One docs IA restructure
descriptionHtml:
Led initiative to unify the Cloudflare One (Cloudflare's Zero Trust solution) documentation with the dashboard product experience. Orchestrated a seven-person writing team to execute a data-driven IA strategy, migrating 600+ pages and clarifying 1,000+ UI instructions. This overhaul eliminated fragmented user journeys and aligned the information architectures.

For more information, refer to the CF1 docs IA restructure Wrapped blog post.

title: AI Week 2025 support
descriptionHtml: Led the Cloudflare One data security documentation for Cloudflare’s inaugural AI Week. Developed technical guides for CASB and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) integrations with LLMs (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini), focusing on preventing misconfigurations and sentiment-based data leaks for enterprise organizations. For more information, refer to the Cloudflare Blog posts for DLP, Shadow IT, and CASB.

title: Application Library docs
descriptionHtml: Served as the primary content stakeholder for the Cloudflare One Experiences team to resolve persistent user confusion regarding Zero Trust SaaS app integrations. Used user feedback to create a centralized Application Library documentation strategy, providing a single source of truth for IT approval and integration workflows.

title: CASB FedRAMP integration expansion
descriptionHtml: CASB expanded its integrations to support FedRAMP variants for ServiceNow, Google Workspace, and Microsoft 365. To support this effort, I created documentation for these more secure variants according to the FedRAMP requirements. These changes directly correlated with an increase in performance ratings in the Gartner Magic Quadrant (MQ) survey.

title: API and Terraform policy overhaul
descriptionHtml: Identified a significant documentation gap for enterprise users that require deploying policies at scale. Designed and implemented a technical specification for representing API and Terraform policies alongside UI examples. Led the rollout of these standards across all Gateway documentation, allowing infrastructure-as-code users to implement baseline policies.

title: Per-account certificates change management
descriptionHtml: Led the change management strategy for a critical security migration following the global Cloudflare root certificate expiration. Managed stakeholder communication and technical documentation to guide enterprise users through transition to unique account-based certificates. Successfully mitigated major service disruptions.

title: Hugo to Starlight migration
descriptionHtml: Acted as a technical lead in migrating the Cloudflare Developer Docs from legacy Hugo site framework to a modern Starlight (Astro) framework. Made foundational IA decisions, updated global styling, and ported Hugo components to JSX to improve site performance and contributor experience.

title: CLUE Index front-end
descriptionHtml: Implemented HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for front-end of internal tool based on designs from UX Content Strategy team. The PCX CLUE (Content Legibility for User Ease) Index is an internal tool used to help stakeholders evaluate their contributions to docs, UI, API, and email content based on best practices and our internal style guide.

title: PyCon US 2024
descriptionHtml: Represented Cloudflare as a technical Subject Matter Expert (SME) at 2024 PyCon US industry conference in Pittsburgh, PA. Used direct developer interactions and UX surveys to identify documentation pain points.

title: Secure your Internet traffic and SaaS apps implementation guide
descriptionHtml: Partnered with Product Managers and Solutions Engineers to create the Secure your Internet Traffic and SaaS apps implementation guide, a from-zero guide for getting started with Cloudflare One. Transformed fragmented technical documentation into a cohesive onboarding funnel, creating an in-depth learning path for both new and advanced Zero Trust security users.

title: UI elements style guide
descriptionHtml: Adapted internal Cloudflare UI design guidelines for the public-facing Cloudflare style guide. By externalizing these guidelines, I made contributions easier for the community and ensured UI consistency across our global open-source docs.

title: Gateway precedence flowchart
descriptionHtml: Added a Mermaid flowchart to the developer docs to visually illustrate how Gateway intercepts, proxies, and filters traffic from onboarding to egressing to the Internet.

title: BSidesPGH 2023
descriptionHtml: Represented Cloudflare as a technical Subject Matter Expert (SME) at 2023 BSidesPGH industry conference in Pittsburgh, PA. Used direct developer interactions and UX surveys to identify documentation pain points.

title: Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) docs revamp
descriptionHtml: Standardized the information architecture for 20+ Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) third-party SaaS integrations to provide a consistent security scanning workflow. This strategic realignment was a key factor in improving Gartner and Forrester market ratings and in securing a major Fortune 500 contract.

title: WARP client certificate third-party installations
descriptionHtml: I maintain the docs page for installing the Cloudflare certificate required by the WARP client to intercept and filter traffic. This work involves testing and documenting how to install certificates to various operating systems, desktop programs, and SaaS apps.

title: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) docs revamp
descriptionHtml: I maintain the documentation for Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention (DLP). When we released predefined entries for DLP profiles (which adds the ability to detect known patterns in your Zero Trust organization's traffic, such as SSNs and credit card numbers), I restructured the DLP docs to guide users through a more logical workflow.

title: Zero Trust-core dashboard merge
descriptionHtml: Led the documentation response for the strategic merge of the Cloudflare "core" and Zero Trust dashboards. Updated the documentation to reflect new feature discoverability paths and ensure a seamless transition for all Cloudflare users.

title: Studyfinder
descriptionHtml: Worked in a team of 5 to conceptualize and prototype an app to help students find and rate study spaces on campus. Watch our problem space video.

title: Docs Overview page redesign
descriptionHtml: Implemented HTML components for site builder (Hugo) to organize all product landing pages. We designed this template to serve as a "nutrition label" for each Cloudflare product. I programmed the components to be flexible and extensible without cluttering Markdown code.

title: Argo Smart Routing docs
descriptionHtml: Authored new documentation for Argo Smart Routing by combining information from multiple different sources across the Cloudflare documentation. This new page acts as a single point-of-presence for Argo documentation for over three million monthly users.

title: Drops
descriptionHtml: Senior English capstone project exploring Internet archival history in the form of an imaginary pseudo-retro operating system.

title: Pitt School of Education Heuristic UX Evaluation report
descriptionHtml: Final group project evaluating the user experience of the University of Pittsburgh School of Education admissions site. My team consulted with the Pitt School of Education's site team to identify pain points, ran research with potential users of the site, and presented final findings and recommendations to the client.

title: Rate Your Music Heuristic UX Evaluation report
descriptionHtml: Heuristic usability and accessibility evaluation of Rate Your Music.

title: Ubuntu UX Strategy report
descriptionHtml: Collaborative project evaluating the user experience of Ubuntu and its documentation. My team created user personas to compare usability with other major operating systems.

title: All's Fair in Robot War
descriptionHtml: Analysis of anthropomorphism of artificial intelligence and its relationship to the use of AI in warfare.

title: Hacker's Delight: Redefining Music Technology
descriptionHtml: Audio podcast exploring the relationship between music and technology. Why don't we hold musical innovation to the same degree as "pure" technological innovation? Featured in the University of Pittsburgh English department's Digital Media & Design Showcase.

descriptionHtml: Reflection on Simon Head's Mindless and simulacra in the workforce.

descriptionHtml: Trailer for Wes Anderson's Rushmore, recut to fit within genre conventions of psychological horror/thriller films.

title: Event poster
descriptionHtml: Poster mock-up for Protomartyr show. This design emulates the band's album cover style. The piece incorporates Andrew Carnegie, a symbol of Pittsburgh's industrial labor history, a salient theme in the band's lyrics.

title: Pitt Campus Corner
descriptionHtml: Contributed front-end design, programming, and documentation to crowd-sourced knowledge site for University of Pittsburgh housing. Iterated according to user feedback from survey. Usability metrics were later analyzed for the Pitt Campus Corner usability report.

title: Burghquest
descriptionHtml: Interactive augmented reality experience exploring Pittsburgh history through regional food and popular culture.

descriptionHtml: Infographic warning of the dangers of computer vision syndrome. Part of series designed to showcase UX design thinking in a technical writing environment.

title: Frozen Safety poster
descriptionHtml: Print poster promoting safety in the ShopRite frozen foods department. Part of series designed to showcase UX design thinking in a technical writing environment.

title: Pittsburgh Food Deserts
descriptionHtml: Geographic data visualization identifying food deserts within Pittsburgh city limits.

title: ¡Presidente Pedro!
descriptionHtml: Generative narrative study analyzing Midwestern Bush-era attitudes towards race and class in Napoleon Dynamite.

title: Queering the Gaze with Some Fava Beans and a Nice Chianti
descriptionHtml: Analysis of Buffalo Bill and Hannibal Lecter's subversion of Hollywood's heteronormative movie killer tropes in Silence of the Lambs.
